actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to suspend until the close of December 31, 1978, the duty on 1,3,5,-Trimethyl-2,4,6-tris3,5-di-tert-butyl-4-hydroxy benzyl benzene.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend temporarily the customs duty on 1, 3, 5,-Trimethyl-2,4,6-tris (3, 5-di-tert-butyl-4- hydroxybenzyl) benzene (a coal tar derivative).

titles.title: A bill to suspend until the close of December 31, 1978, the duty on 1,3,5,-Trimethyl-2,4,6-tris3,5-di-tert-butyl-4-hydroxy benzyl benzene.
